parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Minimum value: 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 50. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The state of the workgroup. Valid values:

*   NotStarted
*   InProgress
*   Cutover
*   Completed

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the reserved instance. You can specify up to 20 tags. If you specify multiple tags, the tag keys cannot be duplicated.

parameters.name: WorkgroupId
parameters.description: The workgroup IDs. You can specify up to 50 workgroup IDs.
